resources.string: The authors would like to thank all of those who agreed to be interviewed and shared their analysis on governance and democratisation issues during the fieldwork in Pakistan. A special thanks to Safdar Sial of the Pakistan Institute for Peace Studies for his dedicated and valuable support during the travels throughout the country. In Quetta, in particular, we would like to express our gratitude to Malik Siraj Akbar for his insightful guidance around the city. To Mirjam Krijnen of the Dutch Embassy in Islamabad, our sincere thanks for her constant interest and
